languages.text: "Признаться, я сама в замешательстве. Как только мы прибыли на {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфол{/g}, я направила запрос корабельному интенданту — добыть певчую пташку. Но он так и не пришел за разъяснениями. А перед самым отбытием мне вдруг доставили несчетное множество клеток, окутанных светло-красной паникой с вкраплениями страха. И все с птицами!"

traits.locale_text: "Признаться, я сама в замешательстве. Как только мы прибыли на {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфол{/g}, я направила запрос корабельному интенданту — добыть певчую пташку. Но он так и не пришел за разъяснениями. А перед самым отбытием мне вдруг доставили несчетное множество клеток, окутанных светло-красной паникой с вкраплениями страха. И все с птицами!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Admittedly, I am at a loss myself. The day we arrived on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} I sent a request to the ship's quartermaster and asked him to get me a songbird. But he never asked for clarification, and shortly before we left I had a countless number of cages delivered to me, all wrapped in bright red panic with flickering tints of fear. There was a bird in every one!"
languages.original_text: "Признаться, я сама в замешательстве. Как только мы прибыли на {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфол{/g}, я направила запрос корабельному интенданту — добыть певчую пташку. Но он так и не пришел за разъяснениями. А перед самым отбытием мне вдруг доставили несчетное множество клеток, окутанных светло-красной паникой с вкраплениями страха. И все с птицами!"

But he never asked for clarifications, and shortly before we left I had a countless number of cages delivered to me, all wrapped in bright red panic with flickering tints of fear. There was a bird in every one!"

But he never asked for clarification, and shortly before we left I had a countless number of cages delivered to me, all wrapped in bright red panic with flickering tints of fear. There was a bird in every one!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “老实说，我自己也是一头雾水。我们抵达{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}那天，我找到了船上的军需官，让他帮我带一只夜莺来，但他一直都没弄清楚我想要的是什么。我们离开之前不久，无数笼子被送到了我的面前。所有的笼子都包裹在鲜红色的恐慌之中，闪烁着恐惧的色彩。每个笼子里都装着一只鸟！”
languages.original_text: "Admittedly, I am at a loss myself. The day we arrived on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} I sent a request to the ship's quartermaster and asked him to get me a songbird. But he never asked for clarification, and shortly before we left I had a countless number of cages delivered to me, all wrapped in bright red panic with flickering tints of fear. There was a bird in every one!"

traits.locale_text: “老实说，我自己也是一头雾水。我们抵达{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}那天，我找到了船上的军需官，让他帮我带一只夜莺来，但他一直都没弄清楚我想要的是什么。我们离开之前不久，无数笼子被送到了我的面前。所有的笼子都包裹在鲜红色的恐慌之中，闪烁着恐惧的色彩。每个笼子里都装着一只鸟！”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Admito que yo tampoco estoy del todo segura. El día que llegamos a {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g}, envié una solicitud al intendente de la nave para que consiguiera un ave cantora. No llegó a pedirme ninguna aclaración, pero poco antes de partir recibí un sinfín de jaulas, todas envueltas en pánico rojo con toques de miedo. ¡En cada una había un pájaro!».
languages.original_text: "Admittedly, I am at a loss myself. The day we arrived on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} I sent a request to the ship's quartermaster and asked him to get me a songbird. But he never asked for clarification, and shortly before we left I had a countless number of cages delivered to me, all wrapped in bright red panic with flickering tints of fear. There was a bird in every one!"

traits.locale_text: «Admito que yo tampoco estoy del todo segura. El día que llegamos a {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g}, envié una solicitud al intendente de la nave para que consiguiera un ave cantora. No llegó a pedirme ninguna aclaración, pero poco antes de partir recibí un sinfín de jaulas, todas envueltas en pánico rojo con toques de miedo. ¡En cada una había un pájaro!».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「確かに、あたくしも途方に暮れております。{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}に到着した日、あたくしは船の補給品管理官に、ソングバードを用意してくれるよう頼みました。しかし、彼は明確な説明を求めることはなく、出発の少し前に、数え切れないほどの数の鳥かごがあたくしのもとへと届けられました。そのすべてが、恐怖がちらつく真っ赤なパニックで包まれていました。そのどれにも鳥が入っていたのです！」
languages.original_text: "Admittedly, I am at a loss myself. The day we arrived on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} I sent a request to the ship's quartermaster and asked him to get me a songbird. But he never asked for clarification, and shortly before we left I had a countless number of cages delivered to me, all wrapped in bright red panic with flickering tints of fear. There was a bird in every one!"

traits.locale_text: 「確かに、あたくしも途方に暮れております。{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}に到着した日、あたくしは船の補給品管理官に、ソングバードを用意してくれるよう頼みました。しかし、彼は明確な説明を求めることはなく、出発の少し前に、数え切れないほどの数の鳥かごがあたくしのもとへと届けられました。そのすべてが、恐怖がちらつく真っ赤なパニックで包まれていました。そのどれにも鳥が入っていたのです！」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Das weiß ich leider selbst nicht so recht. Am Tag unserer Ankunft auf {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} habe ich beim Quartiermeister des Schiffs einen Singvogel angefordert. Er hat keine Einzelheiten nachgefragt, und kurz vor unserer Abreise wurden mir plötzlich unzählige Käfige geliefert, alle gehüllt in knallrote Panik mit flackernden Angstflecken. In jedem davon befand sich ein Vogel!"
languages.original_text: "Admittedly, I am at a loss myself. The day we arrived on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} I sent a request to the ship's quartermaster and asked him to get me a songbird. But he never asked for clarification, and shortly before we left I had a countless number of cages delivered to me, all wrapped in bright red panic with flickering tints of fear. There was a bird in every one!"

traits.locale_text: "Das weiß ich leider selbst nicht so recht. Am Tag unserer Ankunft auf {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} habe ich beim Quartiermeister des Schiffs einen Singvogel angefordert. Er hat keine Einzelheiten nachgefragt, und kurz vor unserer Abreise wurden mir plötzlich unzählige Käfige geliefert, alle gehüllt in knallrote Panik mit flackernden Angstflecken. In jedem davon befand sich ein Vogel!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Sachez que je suis tout aussi abasourdie que vous par toute cette histoire. Comme je voulais un oiseau chanteur, j'ai envoyé une demande au quartier-maître le jour même de notre arrivée à {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g}. Mais il n'a pas cru bon de demander des précisions, et, peu avant notre départ, on m'a livré des dizaines de cages luisant d'une panique rouge et crépitant d'étincelles de peur. Chacune était occupée par un oiseau ! »
languages.original_text: "Admittedly, I am at a loss myself. The day we arrived on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} I sent a request to the ship's quartermaster and asked him to get me a songbird. But he never asked for clarification, and shortly before we left I had a countless number of cages delivered to me, all wrapped in bright red panic with flickering tints of fear. There was a bird in every one!"

traits.locale_text: « Sachez que je suis tout aussi abasourdie que vous par toute cette histoire. Comme je voulais un oiseau chanteur, j'ai envoyé une demande au quartier-maître le jour même de notre arrivée à {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g}. Mais il n'a pas cru bon de demander des précisions, et, peu avant notre départ, on m'a livré des dizaines de cages luisant d'une panique rouge et crépitant d'étincelles de peur. Chacune était occupée par un oiseau ! »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "İtiraf etmek gerekirse ben de şaşırmış durumdayım. {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman'a{/g} ulaştığımız gün geminin levazım subayına bir talepte bulunup bana ötücü bir kuş tedarik etmesini istemiştim. Subay, detayları hiç sormadı ve biz ayrılmadan hemen önce bana sayısız kafes teslim edildi. Hepsi de yanıp sönen korku tonlarına sahip, parlak kırmızı bir panikle sarılmıştı. Hepsinin içinde de bir kuş vardı!"
languages.original_text: "Admittedly, I am at a loss myself. The day we arrived on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} I sent a request to the ship's quartermaster and asked him to get me a songbird. But he never asked for clarification, and shortly before we left I had a countless number of cages delivered to me, all wrapped in bright red panic with flickering tints of fear. There was a bird in every one!"

traits.locale_text: "İtiraf etmek gerekirse ben de şaşırmış durumdayım. {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman{/g}'a ulaştığımız gün geminin levazım subayına bir talepte bulunup bana ötücü bir kuş tedarik etmesini istemiştim ama detayları hiç sormadı ve ayrılışımızdan kısa süre sonra bana sayısız kafes teslim edildi. Hepsi de yanıp sönen korku tonlarına sahip parlak kırmızı bir panikle sarılmıştı. Hepsinin içinde de bir kuş vardı!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
